Package org.apache.juneau.xml

Class XmlReader

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamConstants, javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader, Positionable
public final class XmlReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader, Positionable
Wrapper class around a XMLStreamReader.

The purpose is to encapsulate the reader with the ParserPipe object so that it can be retrieved for debugging purposes.

  • XML Details

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • XmlReader

      protected XmlReader​(ParserPipe pipe, boolean validating, javax.xml.stream.XMLReporter reporter, javax.xml.stream.XMLResolver resolver, javax.xml.stream.util.XMLEventAllocator eventAllocator) throws java.io.IOException, javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      pipe - The parser input.
      validating - The value for the XMLInputFactory.IS_VALIDATING setting.
      reporter - The value for the XMLInputFactory.REPORTER setting.
      resolver - The value for the XMLInputFactory.RESOLVER setting.
      eventAllocator - The value for the XMLInputFactory.ALLOCATOR setting.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown by underling
      javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - Thrown by underlying XML stream.
